Visit The Shop

    Leather Care Company Ireland

    At Leather Care Company Ireland, we stock and sell all the essentials for your leather restoration needs.

    We're excited to annouce that Leather Care Company Ireland are the offical stockists for all Leather Repair Company products on the island of Ireland. We sell Leather Cleaner, Leather Protection, Leather Conditioner, Leather Detailer, Mouuses, Sprays and Creams so you can provide the best upkeep for both your personal and your customers leather goods. Have a browse below and view the fantastic full rage of Leather Care products.

    Delivery

    At Leather Care Company Ireland, we deliver product direct to your door accross both the North and South of Ireland. Deliery is estimated 2 working days. Next day delivery is available at extra cost, for urgent shipments. For more info on deliery information please read our Terms & Condtions.
